Description: 30 Seconds to Mars is an American alternative rock band formed in 1998 in Los Angeles, California. In 2002 was released the debut album of the band called 30 Seconds to Mars. The album, produced only by two brothers Jared Leto and Shannon Leto sold two million copies in the world.13. Shortly before the album's release, and Solon Bixler Matt Wachter joined the band. Sometime later, Solon hung up the quartet and in its place came Tomo MiliÃ„ï¿½eviÃ„â€¡ (2003) with this lineup the band released the album A Beautiful Lie (2005). In 2007, Matt Wachter left the band closing the current lineup, since the band released the album This Is War (2009).
